action.mouse_action: The mouse cursor is hovering over the "+" button, which is likely for creating a new email or other item.
action.general_scene_description: The screenshot shows an email client open with a new email open. The email is from Fujitsu and is requesting to reschedule a meeting.
action.program_description: An email client is open and displaying a new email. The email is from Fujitsu and requests to reschedule a meeting. The original meeting time was 2024-11-17 from 16:00 to 17:00, and the proposed new time is 17:00 to 18:00.
